page.title: 14Survey on ambitions at 10yrs
page.content: In our survey of the ambitions on leaving school.We interviewed 116 of the second year at Aston fields Middle 25.8% wished to go to America (12.9% boys 11.2% girls).10.3% wished to be hairdressers as a job(all girls).13.7% wish to stay in Bromsgrove when they leave school (7.7% boy 6% girls).3.4% wish to be proffesional snooker players.1.7% wish to be Americain football players.2.5% wish to be dentists.0.8% wish to get contact with tribes.2.5% wish to be computer experts.4.3% wish to be teachers.4.3% wish to be in the police force.7.7% are not sure which job they would like to do.3.4% wish to go to France when they leave school.7.7% are not sure which country they would like to go to when they leave school.5.1% wish to be actors or actresses as a job.
